message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $950000. This offer includes all the features you're looking for and more. Let's discuss how we can make this transaction beneficial for both of us.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to work with me. However, I was thinking of a price around $850000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of the product to you and our previous discussion, I propose a price of $900000. This reflects a compromise between our positions while still ensuring a fair return for my company. I hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both parties.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd like to propose a price of $850000 again, as I believe it's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and split the difference, so I'm willing to pay $875000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your effort to find a mutually agreeable price. Based on our ongoing dialogue and the value of the product to you, I would like to propose a price of $890000. I believe this offers a fair compromise and I hope it will allow us to move forward with the transaction.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your persistence in finding a mutually agreeable price. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm willing to pay $870000. I hope we can find a price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I understand your position and I am willing to consider your suggestion. Based on our discussions and the value of the product to you, I propose a price of $880000. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our interests. I look forward to your feedback.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more offer. I'd like to propose a price of $860000. I believe this is the best compromise we can reach, considering the value of the product to me and your company's needs.

Thank you for your final proposal, Bob. I understand your position and I am willing to consider it. Based on our discussions and the value of the product to you, I propose a price of $870000. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our interests. I hope this will be acceptable to you.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I've reached my limit and I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm going to have to pass on this deal. I think I'll explore other options, including buying from John for $1200000. I appreciate your time and effort, but I think we've reached an impasse.
